intent_analysis:
Intent: The user, Dmitriy, expects to turn off all lights that are currently dim, specifically targeting the meross-Light-Strip devices with switch levels of 20% and 90%.  
Constraints & cues: The command is based on the current state of the lights, where the devices with IDs 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298 and 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d are at 20% brightness, indicating they are dim.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding whether the user wants to turn off all lights that are dim or only those below a certain brightness threshold; clarification is needed to avoid turning off lights that may not be intended.
